ingredients.ingredient: 4 cups reduced-sodium chicken or vegetable broth
1 (15 ounce) container BUITONI® Refrigerated Marinara Sauce
1 (9 ounce) package BUITONI® Three Cheese Tortellini
1 cup loose-pack frozen petite peas, thawed

cookingTips: Add tortellini near the end of cooking to prevent them from becoming mushy
Use pre-cooked shrimp to avoid overcooking and toughening the meat
Let wine reduce slightly before adding broth to mellow the alcohol flavor
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How do you time the addition of different ingredients to ensure everything is perfectly cooked without overcooking the shrimp?
